description: Data from raw mill grinding and cyclone preheater system

fields.mill_power_kw: float, power consumption of raw mill motor
fields.mill_feed_rate_tph: float, tonnes per hour of feed
fields.raw_mill_feed_tph: float, tonnes per hour of raw meal produced
fields.raw_mill_power_kw: float, power consumption of raw mill
fields.residue_on_90um_pct: float, residue on 90 micron sieve in %
fields.residue_on_212um_pct: float, residue on 212 micron sieve in %
fields.separator_motor_status: integer, separator motor status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.cyclone_pressure_drop_mbar: float, pressure drop across cyclone in mbar
fields.preheater_CO_pct: float, carbon monoxide percentage in preheater
fields.gas_flow_rate_nm3h: float, gas flow rate in Nm3/h
fields.preheater_cyclone_efficiency_pct: float, efficiency of preheater cyclone in %
fields.co_ppm: float, carbon monoxide concentration in ppm
fields.so2_ppm: float, sulfur dioxide concentration in ppm
fields.no_x_ppm: float, nitrogen oxides concentration in ppm
fields.specific_power_consumption_kwh_t: float, specific power consumption in kWh/t
fields.separator_fan_power_kw: float, power consumption of separator fan
fields.preheater_fan_power_kw: float, power consumption of preheater fan
fields.high_temp_alarm: integer, high temperature alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.high_vibration_alarm: integer, high vibration alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.separator_blockage_alarm: integer, separator blockage alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
fields.fan_failure_alarm: integer, fan failure alarm status (0: Off, 1: On)
